thread.title: Perfect location!
thread.title_full: Perfect location! - Review of London Marriott Hotel County Hall, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: mgravander
title: Perfect location!
text:
Just stayed here in October with my 2 boys on their first ever trip to the UK. The LOVED being able to see the river and the scenery. We paid extra for the clock tower view, which was so worth it in my opinion. THe really felt like they were in "London"! They are young so they loved the whole experience. The pool however, it belongs to a gym that people are members of. Not a true hotel pool experience, which was a bummer for them. People were having swimming lessons and swimming laps, but they still had some fun.
Room Tip: expect to pay for wifi. Lovely rooms, pay for upgraded views! See more room tips
